section.title: Unit Tests
section.para: OTRS provides unit tests for core modules.

section.title: Creating a test file
section.para: The test files are stored in .t files under /scripts/test/*.t. For example the file /scripts/test/Calendar.t for the Calendar Module.

section.title: Testing
section.para:
To check your tests, just use "bin/otrs.UnitTest.pl -n Calendar" to use /scripts/test/Calendar.t.
shell:/opt/otrs> bin/otrs.UnitTest.pl -n Calendar +-------------------------------------------------------------------+ /opt/otrs/scripts/test/Calendar.t: +-------------------------------------------------------------------+ ok 1 - EventAdd() ===================================================================== Product: OTRS 3.2.x git Test Time: 0 s Time: 2010-04-02 12:58:37 Host: yourhost.example.com Perl: 5.8.9 OS: linux TestOk: 1 TestNotOk: 0 ===================================================================== shell:/opt/otrs>
